Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) - The Liberty Mouse Mover
s: The Liberty Mouse Mover has a gently rotating platform on which the mouse is placed. Once the mouse rotates against the edge of housing it stops, and the platform continues to rotate underneath it. This simulates mouse motion. You will see that the cursor on the screen moves in one direction ...
